functionality.name: Help Center
functionality.description: A feature to provide users with categorized help resources, feedback options, and contact support.

requirements.description: The system must let users search for help topics by typing keywords in a search bar.
The system must organize help topics into categories to guide users when they don’t know what to search for.
The system must provide explanations for each help topic selected by the user.
The system must let users give quick feedback on help articles by marking them as helpful or not helpful.
The system must offer users a way to contact support if they can’t find answers in the help articles.
The system must include a simple contact form where users can share their details and explain their issue to support.
The system must show a confirmation message when their contact form is sent successfully.
The system must display a message when no search results are found.
The system must provide navigation between sections like Buying, Selling, or Account Settings for specific help.

epics.description: Create a help center to consolidate support resources.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to browse categorized help topics.

tasks.description: Design the UI to display help topics categorized into sections.
Develop the backend logic to retrieve categorized help topics.
Add click functionality to open detailed articles when a category is selected.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to access a centralized help center.

tasks.description: Create a landing page for the help center with an introductory message.
Link all available support resources (FAQs, contact form, and feedback options).

epics.description: Implement a search and navigation system.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to use a search bar to find specific help topics.

tasks.description: Implement the search bar UI with placeholder text for guidance.
Develop the backend API to fetch help topics based on search keywords.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to navigate through help topic categories.

tasks.description: Design a UI with expandable panels for each category of help topics.
Develop the logic to show or hide categories based on user interactions.
Implement a breadcrumb trail to help users navigate back to the main categories.

epics.description: Provide mechanisms for users to give feedback on help articles.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to give a thumbs up or thumbs down on help articles.

tasks.description: Develop logic to track and store user feedback in the database.
Display an updated count of positive and negative feedback for each article.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see if other users found an article helpful.

tasks.description: Implement a tooltip or message showing how many users found an article helpful.
Fetch and display the helpfulness data dynamically for each article.
Ensure the helpfulness rating updates immediately after user feedback.

epics.description: Enable escalation of user issues from the help center to customer support when needed.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to fill out a contact form when I can’t find a solution.

tasks.description: Create a contact form with input fields for name, email, phone, and message.
Add validation for required fields and proper input formats.
Implement an API endpoint to send the form data to the support team.
Add a Submit button to send the form and a Cancel button to clear the form.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to receive confirmation that my issue has been submitted.

tasks.description: Design a confirmation page to display after a user submits the contact form.
Develop logic to trigger the confirmation page upon successful submission.
Implement an option to return to the help center from the confirmation page.
